titleStmt.title: The wonderful blazing star with the dreadful apparition of two armies in the air. The one out of the north, the other out of the south, as in the figure shown above is represented.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dorman Newman, at the Kings-Armes in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, faded print with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
